text:
dear sirs,

hello!
i am just an ordinary user, used a little bit to vc++, basic and php progamming 
and wnated to do an upgrade to the newest releases of apche and php, apache is 
well running, thanks!, but, i tried a lot, somehow it is'not possible to tell 
the http.conf file the correct parameters for php. i imagine that mod_alias is 
responsible thatfore.
maybe that the syntax of former http.conf-files this the new one has changed a 
lot.
somehow the old scriptalias-command, addhandler-command and a command something 
like "action.." does not work as it should, as i may tell the http.conf-file 
the location of the php-scripts but not to use php ..

thanks a lot for your help,

regards,

michael from vienna/austria/europa ..
p.s.: because of this problem you cannot contact me homepage, but you may have 
a look at www.nic.at for the domain "fotosoft.at"
creator: michi-42@gmx.at
chip@force-elite.com
text: PHP works for me.  Need more details on problems for a real bug report.
